,11.514748175182483,24.85960089474924,0.9345479349136994,0.8480693568477036,['Illinois Assisted Reproductive Healthcare Advisory Question (2024)', 'Illinois Income Tax Advisory Question (2024)', ""Illinois Penalties for Candidate Interference with Election Worker's Duties Advisory Question (2024)""]","['“Should all medically appropriate assisted reproductive treatments, including, but not limited to, in vitro fertilization, be covered by any health insurance plan in Illinois that provides coverage for pregnancy benefits, without limitation on the number of treatments?[2]”', '“Should the Illinois Constitution be amended to create an additional 3% tax on income greater than $1,000,000 for the purpose of dedicating funds raised to property tax relief?[2]”', ""“Should any candidate appearing on the Illinois ballot for federal, State, or local office be subject to civil penalties if the candidate interferes or attempts to interfere with an election worker's official duties?[2]”""]","# Ballot for DuPage County, Illinois
## DuPage County Forest Preserve Commissioner Board District 3
## DuPage County Forest Preserve Commissioner Board District 4
## DuPage County Forest Preserve Commissioner Board District 6
## Illinois Assisted Reproductive Healthcare Advisory Question (2024)

“Should all medically appropriate assisted reproductive treatments, including, but not limited to, in vitro fertilization, be covered by any health insurance plan in Illinois that provides coverage for pregnancy benefits, without limitation on the number of treatments?[2]”
“Should the Illinois Constitution be amended to create an additional 3% tax on income greater than $1,000,000 for the purpose of dedicating funds raised to property tax relief?[2]”
## Illinois Penalties for Candidate Interference with Election Worker's Duties Advisory Question (2024)

“Should any candidate appearing on the Illinois ballot for federal, State, or local office be subject to civil penalties if the candidate interferes or attempts to interfere with an election worker's official duties?[2]”

## Illinois Assisted Reproductive Healthcare Advisory Question (2024)

“Should all medically appropriate assisted reproductive treatments, including, but not limited to, in vitro fertilization, be covered by any health insurance plan in Illinois that provides coverage for pregnancy benefits, without limitation on the number of treatments?[2]”
“Should the Illinois Constitution be amended to create an additional 3% tax on income greater than $1,000,000 for the purpose of dedicating funds raised to property tax relief?[2]”
## Illinois Penalties for Candidate Interference with Election Worker's Duties Advisory Question (2024)

“Should any candidate appearing on the Illinois ballot for federal, State, or local office be subject to civil penalties if the candidate interferes or attempts to interfere with an election worker's official duties?[2]”

## South Lyons Township Sanitary District Trustee Board At-large
## Illinois Assisted Reproductive Healthcare Advisory Question (2024)

“Should all medically appropriate assisted reproductive treatments, including, but not limited to, in vitro fertilization, be covered by any health insurance plan in Illinois that provides coverage for pregnancy benefits, without limitation on the number of treatments?[2]”
“Should the Illinois Constitution be amended to create an additional 3% tax on income greater than $1,000,000 for the purpose of dedicating funds raised to property tax relief?[2]”
## Illinois Penalties for Candidate Interference with Election Worker's Duties Advisory Question (2024)

“Should any candidate appearing on the Illinois ballot for federal, State, or local office be subject to civil penalties if the candidate interferes or attempts to interfere with an election worker's official duties?[2]”

column1: ## Cook County Clerk of the Circuit Court
## La Grange Highlands Sanitary District Trustee Board At-large
## Metropolitan Water Reclamation District of Greater Chicago
## South Lyons Township Sanitary District Trustee Board At-large
## Illinois Assisted Reproductive Healthcare Advisory Question (2024)

“Should all medically appropriate assisted reproductive treatments, including, but not limited to, in vitro fertilization, be covered by any health insurance plan in Illinois that provides coverage for pregnancy benefits, without limitation on the number of treatments?[2]”
“Should the Illinois Constitution be amended to create an additional 3% tax on income greater than $1,000,000 for the purpose of dedicating funds raised to property tax relief?[2]”
## Illinois Penalties for Candidate Interference with Election Worker's Duties Advisory Question (2024)

“Should any candidate appearing on the Illinois ballot for federal, State, or local office be subject to civil penalties if the candidate interferes or attempts to interfere with an election worker's official duties?[2]”
